fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`JMP rel8`
`JMP rel16`
`JMP rel32`
`JMP r/m16`
`JMP r/m32`
`JMP r/m64`
`JMP ptr16:16`
`JMP ptr16:32`
`JMP m16:16`
`JMP m16:32`
`JMP m16:64`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Transfers program control to a different point in the instruction stream without recording return information. The destination (target) operand specifies the address of the instruction being jumped to. This operand can be an immediate value, a general-purpose register, or a memory location.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: This instruction can be used to execute four different types of jumps:
